item.title: Git sparse-checkout
item.description: Sparse checkout To checkout and work only with a subset/subtree of folders from a repo (yes, some people insist in economizing repos) git clone URL --no-checkout # add `--depth 1` to only include latest commit from all commit history cd REPO_ROOT git sparse-checkout init --cone # `--cone` to include root files git sparse-checkout set Apps/OneApp # to set the folders OneApp to be checked-out. All previously set is removed. git sparse-checkout add Apps/OtherApp # to add new folders to the current checkout list.
